original_title: Out of the Mist: An Alternate History of New Zealand Cinema
overview: Two decades on from Cinema of Unease, Tim Wong’s essay film contemplates the prevailing image of a national cinema while privileging some of the images and image-makers displaced by the popular view of filmmaking in Aotearoa. Now streaming for free at: films.lumiere.net.nz
title: Out of the Mist: An Alternate History of New Zealand Cinema
